Text: Thursdayfor coming out to see the boys the other night if you werent there you missed a good show BOM will probably play with Junco Parker again But more important than that is Thursday night at the Medicine Hat Gallery th and Alberta St PM Show up and give some support BOM will be recording live that night and it would be great to have some crowd response on that cd Thanks again for your support hope to see you there

UpdatesWell its a new year and were ready to rawk In the coming months we have quite a bit going on One big high light is Friday March th the White Eagle with Lawnboys For those of you that have never seen them be prepared for some kickin down home funky jam grass Ifn were lucky theyll bust out some Zeppelin More pressing weve got a show Conans th Hawthorne this Friday Jan th w Junco Parker Music starts around and well be on at or so Well be recording live the Medicine Hat Gallery on Thursdays Jan th Feb th Both shows will start around and will only be minutes or an hour so youll be in bed early enough for a school night Were taking the rest of February off on account of Willie gettin hitched Well be at the Buffalo Gap on Friday March nd Upcoming nonBOM shows you may want to check out are AC Cotton whiskey rock straight up Jan th Ash Street The Handsome Family spooky goth country the Blackbird Jan th Concrete Blonde remember high school Roseland Jan th Jay Farrar if you dont know him you should the Aladdin Jan th and Leftover Salmon bring yer weed and yer dancin shoes Crystal Ballroom Feb st We hope to have our live interactive cd available in April Word on the street is that Yodelin Dean and his computer geek friends are putting something cool together Well keep you in the loop In the meantime make sure you visit the web page wwwbomcom to get your daily fix And if you cant remember when we are playing just send an email to mailto the dates will be delivered to you mailbox Were switching servers and updating the page so watch for some changes See yall at the shows XOXO Twenty Four Bitches on Mezcal
